enUS.em_text:
"A one-tab version of the tabs subview that shows Rewards"

"A three-tab version of the tabs subview that shows Challenges, Missions, Rewards"

Gryphon.Client.UI.SeasonalEvents.EventMissionInfo
Gryphon.Client.UI.SeasonalEvents.EventMissionList

m_allowMultiples
"If checked, you can go beyond 1 instance of the mini at a time. This is useful for when you wantto add a mini to a deck, but ignore the add if the user already has that mini in the deck."

m_gameplayConfigs
"Configuration for specific missions launched by this event.
Content Gate = (Optional) Mission can only be played if the content gate is unlocked
Requirement = (Optional) Mission can only be played if the requirement is met
Mission Ref = (Required) Mission to launch
Mission Variant = (Required) Variant of the mission to launch
Event Mode = (Optional) Special event mode to apply during the mission
Event Currency Reward For Mission = (Required) Amount of event currency to reward for playing
Short Description = (Optional) Description which appears in mission list.
Short Description Popup Format = (Optional) If set, the short description will also appear in the mission popup, using this format.
Long Description = (Optional) Description which appears in mission popup. If unset, descriptions will come from the Event Mode or Mission Glue Info"

m_missionActiveText
"SeasonalEventContentGate/MissionActive", "Shown in mission list while missions are active"
m_missionLockedText
"SeasonalEventContentGate/MissionLocked", "Shown in mission list before missions are unlocked"

m_shortDescription
"SeasonalEvents/GameplayConfig/ShortDescription", "Short description text which appears in event mission list or popup"

m_requirementsMetFormat
"EventMissionInfo/RequirementsMet", "Describes mission requirements that have been met within the dialog body"
m_requirementsTooltipFormat
"EventMissionInfo/RequirementsTooltip", "Describes mission requirements that have not yet been met within the button tooltip"
m_requirementsUnmetFormat
"EventMissionInfo/RequirementsUnmet", "Describes mission requirements that have not yet been met within the dialog body"

enUS.content: Season 13 is coming, bringing Arthas Menethil, the Lich King, as a new Alliance and Undead Split Leader. We've made adjustments to Leaders, Troops, and Frostwolf Shaman in PvP.

enUS: [12.0.0.114816] S13 Avatars, MC Heroic, Army Loadouts, Leader Chromaggus, Mini Skins, Arthas Reforged, Shop Offers

enUS.mc_text:

Default = 0
Heroic = 1
Mythic = 2

ARMY LOADOUTS!
Set up multiple loadouts per leader with separate troops, talents, and cosmetics!
SHARE LOADOUTS

*Unowned minis/talents will not be equipped

ARTHAS
Battle the Lich King and climb up Icecrown Citadel's treacherous towers! Unlock the new Arthas Leader and shatter your enemy's frozen souls!

enUS: [Blizzard] Season 13 is Going to be Heroic!

blizzard: Season 13 is Going to be Heroic!

enUS.content: Take to the frozen wastes of Icecrown and battle Arthas at Icecrown Citadel. Defeat him and his minions in a series of 3 challenging maps with increasing difficulty to unlock this new Alliance and Undead Split Leader.

enUS: [Blizzard] Earn Epic Rewards in Heroic Stormwind Siege

blizzard: Earn Epic Rewards in Heroic Stormwind Siege

enUS.content: Get ready to lay siege to the Alliance city of Stormwind! Claim victory in the new Normal and Heroic difficulties to earn epic rewards!

enUS: [Blizzard] Challenge the Lich King and his Minions

blizzard: Challenge the Lich King and his Minions

enUS.content: Take to the frozen wastes of Icecrown and battle Arthas at Icecrown Citadel. Defeat him and his minions in a series of 3 challenging maps with increasing difficulty to unlock this new Alliance and Undead Split Leader. Arthas will be the first Leader to receive skins. Alongside Arthas, we have plans for additional Mini skins that will be coming soon, some sooner than others.

enUS: [12.0.0.115174] Leader Arthas Menethil Mini, Arthas Reforged Event, Shop Offers

enUS.event_text:
A sharply frigid air fills your lungs, and for a brief moment, the dense fog clears ever so slightly... towering above the corrupted mists, you see the ominous and unmistakable silhouette of Icecrown Citadel! The freezing air permeates your entire being - somehow, your very soul feels icy and brittle. Enter, brave one, and battle your way up towards the Frozen Throne, to vanquish the Lich King Arthas! Rise to the occasion and fight your way through Normal, Heroic, and Mythic variants! Unlock the brand new Arthas Menethil leader, and harness his Soulshattering, skeleton-raising might against your foes!

The Lower Spire (Normal): Arthas calls Mor'Ladim into service to patrol the Lower Spire! Minis who die near them are converted into enemy Skeleton Mages! Look out for Arthas's Frost aura, along with periodic Skeletal summons at buildings he controls, and more Skeletal summons at certain health thresholds!

The Pit of Saron (Normal): Arthas continues to summon Skeletal reinforcements, and enlists the help of dangerous Gargoyles to dismantle your fortifications! Be wary of his Winter Storms, freezing your Minis, who damage nearby allies when they snap out!

The Frozen Throne (Normal): Arthas empowers himself for his final stand, and brings new abilities to the fight! Be on the watch for Undead Footmen summons, AOE anti-air, and more. Steel yourself against his menacing Death Grip, pulling Ranged Minis into his grasp. Guard your buildings from his deadly Defile, slowly corrupting and crumbling your defenses! Will you prevail?

The Lower Spire (Heroic): All enemies gain 2 levels! Mini-Rattlegores patrol the area, and Mor'Ladim gains a Frost aura!

The Pit of Saron (Heroic): All enemies gain 2 levels! Additional Gargoyles and Mini-Gishes wait menacingly on the path to Arthas. Explosive Abominations join the fight, and Winter Storms are more frequent!

The Frozen Throne (Heroic): All enemies gain 2 levels! Arthas gains Icy Talons, granting him increased attack speed for each of your nearby Minis!

The Lower Spire (Mythic): All enemies gain 4 levels! Mor'Ladim summons Undead Footmen on death! Arthas and Mor'Ladim send out map-wise Frost waves at 50% health!

The Pit of Saron (Mythic): All enemies gain 4 levels! Gish awaits you in true form. Your Minis are subject to Soulshatter - while Frosted, any damage below 20% health will kill them instantly! Arthas also applies Poison with his Winter Storms and at health thresholds!

The Frozen Throne (Mythic): All enemies gain 4 levels! Baron Rivendare arrives to protect Arthas and summon additional Skeletons to the fight! Arthas takes towers and Freezes your Minis more often!
enUS.shop_text:
Crown Prince of Lordaeron
Epic Arthas Awakens
Pillars of Frost

enUS: [Blizzard] Hotfix for the Lich King Event and Heroic Stormwind

blizzard: Hotfix for the Lich King Event and Heroic Stormwind

enUS.content: We've slightly reduced the difficulty for Normal Lower Spire, fixed an issue with Lich King skipping phase transitions, and fixed an issue that kept Highlord Bolvar Fordragon from activating his Consecrate ability in Heroic Stormwind Siege.
Tap the shark in Booty Bay for a jaws-ome surprise! We've fixed issues with Polymorph and the Lich King's Soulshatter ability that would cause the game to crash.

enUS: [Blizzard] Difficulty Adjustments for the Lich King Event

blizzard: Difficulty Adjustments for the Lich King Event

enUS.content: We've reduced enemy income on all difficulties, reduced the level of Normal Missions by 1, and reduced the difficulty of Heroic Pit of Saron.
